description:
This online course teaches you all the basic functions and shortcuts of MS Excel to make you get quicker at using this versatile software.

You can use MS Excel to manage everything from mundane household tasks to the most complicated reports at work.

  • Learn to sort through data and apply reality checks on data
  • Learn to apply powerful text functions to database for analyses
  • Learn Basics, best practices, common mistakes, and when to apply
  • Make visually appealing tables and charts quickly
  • Learn to dynamically highlight /sort data to make business decisions
  • Learn to analyze data according to pre-determined criteria

At the end of the class you will be confident, proficient and quick in using Excel for a large variety of business purposes.
title: How to use Excel Faster
